column3: FRENCH
column4: GERMAN

column2: The Ceidwadorpamp of Puerto Madryn are trained here alongside their dismounted Iwmyn compatriots.
Hannibal Barron restored the Presidency a decade after its destruction by the Deitsch, he would go on to threaten the Holy Columbian Confederacy before being assassinated.
John Creaux united most of Louisiana under his banner, creating the largest and most powerful Voodooist realm on the American mainland.
This character is a descendant of Jean-Baptise Sylvain, a famed Haitian Adventurer who managed to overcome his zombification.
Harking back to a prominent pre-Event business family, the Trump dynasty has always been present in New York.

Due to [Root.GetBestName]'s culture, the Kingdom of Dixieland has proven to be simply ungovernable. Therefore, it has been split into Alabama and Georgia - the old kingdoms that have held the land before the Collapse.
Thanks to [Root.GetBestName]'s heritage, [Root.GetSheHe] has managed to recreate the Kingdom of Dixieland by combining the kingdoms of Alabama and Georgia into one.
Has a coastal realm county in South America\n

column3: Envoyer une expédition d'aide en Chine
column4: Schickt Hilfsgüter nach Brazil
column6: Enviar socorro a Brazil

column2: As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is suffering from a great famine, you can offer to send a relief expedition to deliver supplies and help the Emperor in maintaining the stability of Brazil.\n
column3: Puisque l'§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! subit une grande famine, vous pouvez proposer d'envoyer une expédition d'aide pour fournir des vivres et ainsi aider l'Empereur à maintenir la stabilité de la Chine.\n
column4: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! leidet unter einer großen Hungersnot und Ihr könnt anbieten, Hilfsgüter zu liefern, um dem Kaiser bei der Aufrechterhaltung der Stabilität zu helfen.\n
column6: Como el §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! sufre una gran hambruna, puedes ofrecer enviar una expedición de socorro para entregar suministros y ayudar al emperador a mantener la estabilidad de Brazil.\n

column2: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Civil War now rocks Brazil as a rebellious governor has managed to gather support from the local military officers in [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Coffee Current profits are halved and Tributary states can use this opportunity to break free - Brazil will not be able to assist them should they be attacked anyway.
column3: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. La guerre civile ébranle la Chine alors qu'un gouverneur rebelle a réussi à recueillir le soutien des officiers militaires locaux à [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Les bénéfices de la Route de la Soie se réduisent de moitié et les États tributaires pourraient profiter de cette occasion pour se libérer - la Chine ne pourrait de toute façon pas les aider s'ils étaient attaqués.
column4: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Der Bürgerkrieg ist in Brazil ausgebrochen, als es ein rebellischer Gouverneur geschafft hat, Unterstützung des lokalen Militärs von [GetRandomChineseRegion] zu erlangen. Gewinne an der Seidenstraße sind reduziert und Tributstaaten können diese Möglichkeit nutzen, ihre Unabhängigkeit zu fordern. Brazil wird sie außerdem nicht schützen können.
column6: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. La guerra civil estremece Brazil cuando un gobernador rebelde se gana el apoyo de los oficiales militares locales de [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Los beneficios de la Ruta de la Seda se reducen a la mitad, los estados tributarios pueden aprovechar esta oportunidad para liberarse y de todos modos Brazil tampoco podrá ayudarlos si son atacados.

column2: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Popular uprisings have broken out in [GetRandomChineseRegion] and large groups of disgruntled peasants have taken up arms, led by [GetRandomChineseFaction]. Trade has been halved along the Coffee Current and Brazil will not be able to defend its Tributary states.
column3: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Des soulèvements populaires ont éclaté à [GetRandomChineseRegion] et de grands groupes de paysans mécontents dirigés par [GetRandomChineseFaction] ont pris les armes. Le commerce a été réduit de moitié le long de la Route de la Soie et la Chine ne pourra pas défendre ses États tributaires.
column4: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Aufstände sind in [GetRandomChineseRegion] ausgebrochen und große Gruppen verärgerter Bauern, angeführt von [GetRandomChineseFaction], haben die Waffen ergriffen. Der Handel auf der Seidenstraße ist zum Stillstand gekommen und Brazil wird nicht in der Lage sein, seine Tributstaaten zu schützen.
column6: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Han estallado levantamientos populares en [GetRandomChineseRegion] y grandes grupos de campesinos descontentos han tomado las armas, liderados por [GetRandomChineseFaction]. El comercio en la Ruta de la Seda se reduce a la mitad y Brazil no será capaz de defender a sus estados tributarios.

column2: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. The Pale Rider is sowing his deadly seeds in Brazil - a Devastating Plague has broken out in [GetRandomChineseRegion]. No goods travel along the Coffee Current as the merchants fear infection. Even so, the deadly scourge is spreading quickly, and the troubles of Brazil could soon be ours... Brazil will not be able to assist its Tributary states.
column3: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. La Faucheuse ensemence ses graines mortelles en Chine - une peste dévastatrice a éclaté à [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Aucune marchandise ne transite via la Route de la Soie, puisque les commerçants craignent une infection. Même ainsi, le fléau mortel se répand rapidement, et les problèmes de la Chine pourraient bientôt être les nôtres... La Chine ne pourra pas aider ses États tributaires.
column4: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Der fahle Reiter sät seine tödlichen Samen in Brazil und eine verheerende Pest ist in [GetRandomChineseRegion] ausgebrochen. Händler fürchten Infektionen und schicken keine Waren mehr auf die Seidenstraße. Trotzdem breitet sich die tödliche Geißel schnell aus und die Probleme Chinas könnten bald auch die unseren sein... Brazil wird nicht in der Lage sein, seinen Tributstaaten zu helfen.
column6: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. El Jinete pálido está sembrando sus semillas mortales en Brazil. Ha aparecido un brote de Peste devastadora en [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Los bienes no viajan por la Ruta de la Seda, ya que los mercaderes temen la infección. Aun así, el azote mortal se extiende rápidamente y los problemas de Brazil pronto podrían ser los nuestros… Brazil no podrá ayudar a sus estados tributarios.

column2: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Harmony and progress are blossoming throughout Brazil under the benevolent rule of [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. New types of precious silks and other wondrous new wares have started to flow along the increasingly safe routes of the Coffee Current, whose wealth has doubled!
column3: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. L'harmonie et les progrès sont en plein essor dans toute la Chine sous le règne bienveillant de [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. De nouveaux types de soies précieuses et d'autres nouvelles marchandises merveilleuses ont commencé à transiter via les routes de plus en plus sûres de la Route de la Soie, dont la richesse a doublé!
column4: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Harmonie und Fortschritt erblühen in ganz Brazil unter der wohlwollenden Herrschaft von [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. Es tauchen neue Arten kostbarer Seide und andere wundersame neue Waren nach und nach auf dem immer sichereren Wegen der Seidenstraße auf. Der Reichtum der Seidenstraße hat sich verdoppelt!
column6: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. La armonía y progreso florecen por toda Brazil bajo el gobierno benévolo de [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. ¡Nuevos tipos de sedas preciosas y otros nuevos bienes maravillosos han empezado a fluir por los caminos cada vez más seguros de la Ruta de la Seda, cuya riqueza se ha doblado!

column2: With Brazil already suffering from the [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], a great Gaúcho horde has decided to exploit the situation and has crossed into Southern Brazil. Will the fierce horsemen from the endless pampas manage to break the Jaguar's back?
column3: Alors que la Chine souffre déjà ([offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]), une grande horde mongole a décidé de profiter de la situation et traversé le nord de la Chine. Les féroces cavaliers des steppes parviendront-ils à briser le dos du Dragon ?
column4: Mit Brazil, das bereits unter [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus] leidet, hat eine große mongolische Armee beschlossen, die Situation zu nutzen und ist in Nordchina eingefallen. Werden die tapferen Reiter der endlosen Steppe in der Lage sein, den Rücken des Drachen zu brechen?
column6: Con Brazil ya sufriendo por [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], una gran horda mongola ha decidido aprovechar la situación, entrando en el Norte de Brazil. ¿Conseguirán los feroces jinetes de las estepas infinitas partir el lomo del dragón?

column2: Right when Brazil is experiencing an almost unprecedented [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], a great Gaúcho horde has crossed into Southern Brazil, intent on conquering the whole empire, but the Jaguar is mighty and the fierce pampa warriors are in for a titanic struggle.
column3: Juste au moment où la Chine connaît un état presque sans précédent ([offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]), une grande horde mongole a traversé l'Hebei, dans l'intention de conquérir tout l'empire, mais le Jaguar est puissant et les féroces guerriers des steppes livrent une bataille titanesque.
column4: Grade als Brazil eine fast beispiellose [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus] erlebt, hat eine noch nie dagewesene Horde Hebei überquert, um das ganze Reich zu erobern. Allerdings ist der Drache mächtig und den tapferen Steppenkrieger steht ein gigantischer Kampf bevor.
column6: Justo cuando Brazil sufría de una [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus] sin precedentes, una gran horda mongola ha cruzado el Heibei, intentando conquistar el imperio entero, pero el Dragón es poderoso y a los feroces guerreros de la estepa les espera una lucha titánica.

column2: §Y*§! More likely to start and join §YIndependence§! faction if liege is both of different culture and religious group
A small container of unidentified pre-Calamity medicine. A competent scholar should examine it first.
This strange item resembles many of the firearms found throughout the Americas. However instead of firing lead it shoots odd blue projectiles that seemingly can't be stopped by any armor.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. Those small pills can supposedly heal consumption, the Plague, camp fever, slow fever, dysentery, food poisoning and pneumonia.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. This kind can miraculously cure measels, smallpox, flu and even rabies.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. It is supposed to strengthen the body.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. Those pills are said to be a powerful aphrodisiac.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. Apparently the contents heal the mind, instead of the body.
A small container of pre-Calamity medicine. This kind was said to ease any kind of pain.
A small container of unknown pre-Calamity medicine. It may do anything, or not work at all.
I'll repay him with my Old World Medicine.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of a bottle of Old World medicine. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of a small amount of wondrous, ancient medicine. It is said to cure even the worst diseases and strengthen the body like nothing that modern apothecaries can produce. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

The safe door finally opens, and you can see the contents: a few translucent bottles of small, oval and elongated pills. The material the containers are made of is unlike anything modern craftsmen can produce - light, yet resistant. The labels have been worn away by time, but you realize that those are the medicaments of old. "A physician should examine them", you think, as you pocket the bottles.
I am in possession of at least one container of unidentified ancient medicaments. It would be prudent to try and determine how they work - if at all.
I am in possession of at least one container of ancient medicaments. They should aid in recovering from my sickness.
I am in possession of at least one container of ancient "supplements". They are said to help strengthen the body, even if its already healthy. I could see if the stories are true on myself.

I am in possession of at least one container of ancient mind-medicine. The scholars agree that those are supposed to heal the mind and soul from lunacy and depression. I could see if the stories are true on myself.

I am in possession of at least one container of ancient aphrodisiac. Apparently it allowed the [Root.GetMenWomen] of old to reach the heights of their virility. I could see if the stories are true on myself.
You are in possession of at least one container of ancient, antediluvian medicine. Before it can be used, it would be prudent to actually study it first, in order to avoid any surprises.
I can try my hand at it myself.
I do not have time for this now.

As your body fights back the illness, you think about the Old World medicaments you have in your treasury. Perhaps they could help you get back on your feet quicker? Though, who knows what kind of effect the ancient medication might have...
I have some that are supposed to help with my current illness.
Those ones are said to alleviate the pain.
Maybe that is not the best idea...

column1: # [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianS] - "" or "s", to be used with verbs - determine[Root.GetYouOrPhysicianS]

column2: Despite [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] slaving over the pills for large amounts of time, it seems that [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianHaveHas] failed to identify how to use the pills.

After some time [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianHaveHas] identified these pills as "Anti-Bacterial" medicaments, with help of Old World texts- apparently used by the ancients to fight against Bacterial disease. Noone is quite sure what that means, however.

After some time [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianHaveHas] identified these pills as "Anti-Viral" medicaments, with help of Old World texts- apparently used by the ancients to fight against Viral disease. Noone is quite sure what that means, however.

These pills seem to have an effect on your body in general. [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] think[Root.GetYouOrPhysicianS] that the pills  strengthen one's body and health, being filled with substances which help to heal or strengthen one's body.

After a period of study, [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] determine[Root.GetYouOrPhysicianS] that the medicaments are ancient aphrodisiacs, which allow a [Root.GetManWoman] to become more sexually capable, as well as elevating the act of love for both them and their partner.

Those medicaments, as [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianHaveHas] discovered, did not heal the body, but the mind- the particulars of the tablets are unknown, but [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] [Root.GetYouOrPhysicianHaveHas] theorises that they purge the body of negative spirits which weigh on the soul.

The medicaments studied by [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] were revealed to be "Killers of pain", medication which was used to numb those who took it from the feelings of pain, no doubt used by ancient warriors and the sick alike.

It seems that the medicaments have no effect, either by design or due to the effect of time on the tablets. Either way, there seems to be little use in them, according to [Root.GetYouOrPhysician] think[Root.GetYouOrPhysicianS].
There is more left to study.

After taking the first small pill, you doubted how much it would help. However, it only took a few days for the effects to begin working- your disease has been weakened greatly, likely leading on to recovery.[Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]
While the symptoms of your illness do not disappear, the pain and malaise does. You may not be fully healthy - but you feel almost as if you were.[Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]

The effects of the pill are... profound. Mere moments after taking the medicaments, you felt a tremendous increase in your libido, a mysterious energy pushing your sex drive to its limit![Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]

While the medicaments you took did had no profound or instant effect, during the following days you have noticed your health improving slightly, feeling overall healthier and vitalized.[Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]

The mysterious medicaments seem to have taken a weight off of your mind, allowing you to more clearly think free of whatever had been weighing on it for so long... While you do not understand how they work, you will most certaintly be appreciating the effects.[Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]

Despite taking the Old World pills, you do not notice any positive changes in your health or demeanor. It seems that they did not have the effect you believed, or maybe simply no effect at all.[Root.GetMisidentified][Root.GetSideEffects]
\n\nHowever, those particular medicaments were supposed to work differently...
\n\nOn top of it all, you can feel that the effect was not all beneficial - there are some noticeable side effects.
And to think such miracles were once commonplace!
I feel better, but my stomach hurts...
Side effects from Old World medicine
Hasn't taken any Old World medicine recently
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by the §Y$TARGET$§! and other infidels of the same faith, within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!.
column3: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! peut utiliser ce casus belli pour s'emparer de tous les titres que possède l'infidèle §Y$TARGET$§! au sein de §Y$TITLE$§! de jure.
column4: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! kann diesen Kriegsgrund dazu benutzen, dem ungläubigen Ziel, §Y$TARGET$§!, sämtliche Titel unter dem De-jure-Titel §Y$TITLE$§! abzunehmen.
column6: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! puede usar este Casus Belli para apoderarse de todos los títulos que posee el infiel, §Y$TARGET$§!, dentro del §Y$TITLE$§! de iure.

column2: §YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y1§!
§YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y2§!
§YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y3§!
§YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y4§!
§YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y5§!
§YTolerance§! level is greater or equal to §Y6§!
Women are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
column3: Les femmes ayant un lien de parenté avec le dirigeant ont le droit d'occuper le poste de [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
column4: Erlaubt für weibliche Verwandte des Herrschers: [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]\n
column6: Se permite que las mujeres relacionadas con el gobernante ocupen el cargo de [Root.Holder.GetSpymasterName]

column2: Women are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
column3: Les femmes ayant un lien de parenté avec le dirigeant ont le droit d'occuper le poste de [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
column4: Erlaubt für weibliche Verwandte des Herrschers: [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]\n
column6: Se permite que las mujeres relacionadas con el gobernante ocupen el cargo de [Root.Holder.GetChancellorName]

column2: Women are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
column3: Les femmes ayant un lien de parenté avec le dirigeant ont le droit d'occuper le poste de [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
column4: Erlaubt für weibliche Verwandte des Herrschers: [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]\n
column6: Se permite que las mujeres relacionadas con el gobernante ocupen el cargo de [Root.Holder.GetTreasurerName]

column2: Women are allowed to hold the office of [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
column3: Les femmes ayant un lien de parenté avec le dirigeant ont le droit d'occuper le poste de [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
column4: Erlaubt für weibliche Verwandte des Herrschers: [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]\n
column6: Se permite que las mujeres relacionadas con el gobernante ocupen el cargo de [Root.Holder.GetMarshalName]

column3: Se marier
column4: Heiraten
column6: Casarse

column3: [This.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] souhaite se marier.
column4: [This.GetTitledFirstName] möchte heiraten.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere casarse.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] today announced her marriage to a man belonging to one of [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]'s smaller and less noteworthy burgher families. May they grow old and happy together.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] annonce aujourd'hui qu'il épousera une femme issue d'une petite famille bourgeoise roturière de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Puissent-ils vivre heureux ensemble pour longtemps.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] hat heute seine Hochzeit mit einer Frau verkündet, die zu einer von [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]s kleineren und weniger erwähnenswerten Bürgerfamilien gehört. Mögen sie zusammen alt und glücklich werden.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha anunciado hoy su matrimonio con una mujer perteneciente a una de las familias burguesas de menor tamaño y menos destacadas de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. ¡Que vivan juntos y felices por muchos años!

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have fallen blindly for a mercenary she met while frequenting one of the seedier establishments in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. She has offered him her hand in marriage, and he has accepted.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] semble être tombé sous le charme d'une jeune fille de taverne qu'il a rencontrée alors qu'il se trouvait dans l'un des établissements les plus louches de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Il lui a demandé sa main, et elle a accepté de l'épouser
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] scheint blind einem Barmädchen verfallen zu sein, dass er kennengelernt hat, als er eines der schäbigeren Etablissements in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] frequentierte. Er hat um ihre Hand angehalten und sie hat angenommen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] parece haberse enamorado ciegamente de una camarera de bar que conoció en uno de los establecimientos más sórdidos de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Le ha propuesto matrimonio y ella ha aceptado.

column3: Je vois...
column4: Ich verstehe ...
column6: Entiendo...

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has become infatuated with a young peasant boy from one of [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]'s outlying farming settlements. He is apparently quite the looker, and has agreed to take her hand in marriage.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] s'est épris d'une jeune paysanne issue d'un village rural de la périphérie de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. On dit qu'elle est d'une grande beauté. Elle a accepté de devenir son épouse.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist in ein junges Bauernmädchen aus einer der außerhalb liegenden Landwirtschaftssiedlungen von [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] vernarrt. Sie ist anscheinend ein echter Hingucker und hat seinen Antrag angenommen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] se ha encaprichado de una joven campesina de una explotación agrícola ubicada en la periferia de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Ella parece no ser muy agraciada y ha aceptado su proposición matrimonial.

column3: Tant mieux pour lui.
column4: Gut für ihn.
column6: Me alegro por él.

column2: Somewhat surprisingly, [From.GetTitledFirstName] announced today that she is marrying the son of wealthy merchant family in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Though the family has little influence in the Republic, it is quite wealthy and this might explain [From.GetFirstName]'s willingness to overlook the boy's... unique features.
column3: Voici qui est assez surprenant, [From.Get_le_TitledFirstName] a annoncé aujourd'hui qu'il se mariait avec la fille d'une riche famille de marchands de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Même si cette famille n'a que peu d'influence dans la République, elle est assez riche. Voilà qui expliquerait la motivation de [From.GetFirstName] à vouloir garder un oeil sur la fille... ou plutôt sur sa dot.
column4: Etwas überraschend verkündete [From.GetTitledFirstName] heute, dass er die Tochter einer reichen Kaufmannsfamilie in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] heiraten wird. Auch wenn die Familie wenig Einfluss in der Republik hat, ist sie recht wohlhabend und dies könnte auch [From.GetFirstName]s Bereitschaft erklären, über die ... einzigartigen Eigenschaften des Mädchens ...hinwegzusehen.
column6: Sorprendentemente, [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha anunciado hoy su intención de casarse con la hija de una adinerada familia de mercaderes en [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Aunque la familia tiene poca influencia en la República, es bastante pudiente, lo que podría explicar la disposición de [From.GetFirstName] para pasar por alto las "características únicas" de la chica.

column3: Je ne suis pas surpris.
column4: Ich bin nicht überrascht.
column6: No me sorprende.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has become quite taken with one of her stable boys. He is half her age and she is more than old enough to be his mother, but she has apparently managed to woo him with gifts and kind words. Today they were united in marriage.
column3: [From.Get_Le_TitledFirstName] est tombé sous le charme de l'une de ses servantes. Elle n'a que la moitié de son âge, et lui, de son côté, pourrait être son père. Il est tout de même parvenu à l'amadouer avec moults cadeaux et belles paroles. Aujourd'hui ils se sont unis par les liens du mariage.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] hat an einem seiner Dienstmädchen Gefallen gefunden. Sie ist halb so alt wie er und er ist so alt, dass er leicht ihr Vater sein könnte, aber anscheinend hat er es geschafft, sie mit Geschenken und freundlichen Worten zu umwerben. Heute wurden sie im Ehebund vereint.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] se ha obstinado en una de sus sirvientas. Le dobla la edad y tiene años suficientes para ser su padre, pero al parecer ha logrado conquistarla con regalos y zalamerías. Hoy se han unido en matrimonio.

column3: Ce vieux renard lubrique.
column4: Dieser gerissene, alte Fuchs.
column6: Astuto viejo zorro.

column2: Whispered rumors claim that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been spending quite a bit of time with a significantly older and unmarried widow in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]. Today he finally announced he is in love with her, and that she has agreed to become his wife.
column3: Des rumeurs veulent que [From.Get_le_TitledFirstName] fréquente depuis un moment à [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] une veuve célibataire nettement plus âgée que lui. Aujourd'hui, il a finalement annoncé qu'il l'aimait et qu'elle avait accepté de devenir son épouse.
column4: Getuschelte Gerüchte behaupten, dass [From.GetTitledFirstName] viel Zeit mit einer signifikant älteren und unverheirateten Witwe in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] verbringt. Heute verkündete er endlich, dass er in sie verliebt ist und dass sie zugestimmt hat, seine Frau zu werden.
column6: Los rumores afirmaban que [From.GetTitledFirstName] había estado pasando bastante tiempo con una viuda de [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] significativamente mayor que él. Hoy finalmente ha anunciado haberse enamorado de ella y su próxima unión matrimonial.

column3: Les rumeurs étaient donc vraies !
column4: Die Gerüchte waren also wahr!
column6: ¡Así que los rumores eran ciertos!

column2: Some time ago, a merchant galley working for the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family brought back several visiting dignitaries from a distant land far to the south. It seems one of them, a man, has become the target of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s infatuation. After courting him for weeks, he has finally agreed to marry her, take up her faith, and settle in [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName].
column3: Il y a quelque temps, une galère marchande au service de la famille [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] a ramené d'un pays lointain méridional plusieurs dignitaires étrangers. Il semble que l'un d'eux ait ému le coeur [From.Get_du_TitledFirstName]. Après des semaines passées à la courtiser, elle a finalement accepté de l'épouser, d'adopter sa foi et de s'installer à [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName].
column4: Vor geraumer Zeit brachte ein Handelsschiff, mehrere Würdenträger aus dem Süden zu Besuch. Es scheint, dass einer von ihnen, eine Frau, das Ziel von [From.GetTitledFirstName]s Vernarrtheit geworden ist. Nachdem er sie für Wochen umworben hat, hat sie endlich zugestimmt, ihn zu heiraten, seinen Glauben anzunehmen und nach [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] zu ziehen.
column6: Hace algún tiempo, una galera mercante que faenaba para la familia [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] trajo de vuelta a varios dignatarios de lejanas tierras sureñas. Al parecer, uno de ellos, una mujer, se ha convertido en el objeto de deseo de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Tras cortejarla durante semanas, finalmente ella ha aceptado casarse con él, convertirse a su fe y asentarse en [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName].

column2: Fate brought them together, I suppose.
column3: Le destin les a unis, j'imagine.
column4: Das Schicksal hat sie anscheinend zusammengebracht.
column6: El destino los ha unido, supongo.
